column1: 251111,Dietitian,,"Provide health and wellness advice to patients, program participants or caregivers
column7: Manage preparation of special meals or diets
column9: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column11: Monitor nutrition-related activities of individuals or groups
column13: Enter patient or treatment data into computers
column15: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column17: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
column19: Conduct health or safety training programs
column21: Advise communities or institutions regarding health or safety issues
column29: Implement organisational process or policy changes
column31: Design public or employee health programs
column33: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
